characteristics.name: Creativity
characteristics.description: A user consistently showcases innovative thinking and artistic expression in their casts.

characteristics.name: Humor
characteristics.description: A user frequently incorporates humor and wit into their casts, making it a distinctive aspect of their communication style.

characteristics.name: Confidence
characteristics.description: A user consistently exudes self-assurance and confidence in their casts, which influences how they approach challenges.

characteristics.name: Empathy
characteristics.description: A user demonstrates a strong ability to understand and relate to others in their casts, making empathy a core aspect of their personality.

characteristics.name: Curiosity
characteristics.description: A user consistently shows a desire to learn and explore new ideas in their casts, making curiosity a defining trait.

characteristics.name: Determination
characteristics.description: A user consistently demonstrates persistence and determination in their casts, which influences how they approach challenges.

characteristics.name: Adaptability
characteristics.description: A user consistently shows an ability to adapt to changing situations in their casts, making adaptability a valuable quality.

characteristics.name: Authenticity
characteristics.description: A user consistently strives to be genuine and authentic in their casts, which influences how they interact with others.
